Player History
Had first career hit on 4/13/2013, off Roy Halladay (PHI)...
Earned first career win on 4/26/2013...
Traded from Milwaukee to Miami on 7/19/2014 (Going to MIL: P Brad Hand, RF Marcell Ozuna. Going to MIA: P Yovani Gallardo, P Devin Williams)...
8/8/2014: Signed a contract extension with Miami, $1,350,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Miami to St. Louis on 7/3/2016 (Going to STL: P Yovani Gallardo, RF David Dahl. Going to MIA: P Allen Hughes)...
11/2/2016: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $5,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 5/13/2017 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/19/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $3,100,000 per year...
Injured on 5/22/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Chicago (A) on 7/1/2019.
Was claimed off waivers by Pittsburgh on 3/3/2020.
Released by Pittsburgh on 5/24/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 6/10/2021 to a minor league deal...
Released by Pittsburgh on 10/3/2021...
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by Boston in 2023...
